entry.title: Tuesday: A few showers. High 9.
entry.summary: Showers with risk of a thunderstorm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 20 near noon then southeast 30 late this afternoon except gusting to 50 near the water. High 9. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Wind southeast 30 km/h except gusting to 50 near the water. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers in the morning. Clearing near noon. Wind southeast 30 km/h except gusting to 50 near the water in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind becoming light in the afternoon. High 10. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Tuesday 18 April 2023
